reviewText: Not that Gable was technical, but I would've liked to learn how to develop the techniques from a novice. This is pretty much a demonstration DVD of his program.

One of the great videos from one of the greatest wrestlers of all times and the greatest wrestling coach in the history of wrestling.  It was very informative especially for me that when I purchased the video, I had just started coaching.

Very good and motivating review of the essential drills in standing position leading to the ground. Pummelling, ties, finishes, defensive and offensive movements (among others) are presented in sequences and may help the confirmed wrestler as well as the less experienced.

Dan Gable has spent a life time perfecting every aspect of wrestling.  This video is 30 minute of high powered wrestling information.  These moves will blend with any style wrestling to make any wrestler or coach better.
